title: T206 Addie Joss (Polar Bear and Sovereign) PSA 7
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: T206 Addie Joss (Polar Bear and Sovereign) PSA 7
posts.post_content:
Hi all. I have a nice pair of T206 Addie Joss cards I would consider selling or trading in the right deal. I do want to keep them as a pair, at least for now. Feel free to shoot me a PM if you want to chit chat about a potential deal. I tried my best to get as close up on the cards as possible, but I am sure the pictures could be better, so for that I apologize.Thank you everyone for looking.

Derek

Joss (pitching) ... Polar Bear ... PSA 7
Joss (portrait) ... Sovereign 350 ... PSA 7
Gorgeous cards! Good luck in the sale/trade.

Thank you. I appreciate the kind words.

Derek
The really are beautiful Derek.  I was awake when you first posted them and I was staring at them as I passed out at 4am this morning.  When I woke up ..... they were staring back at me :)
Thank you very much Steve. I really appreciate the compliments from the guys on this forum.

I wanted to "bump" this thread ...

I am interested in making a trade if I can find what I am looking for. My true interest lies in interesting T206 advertising reverses, and if there is a cool player/ image on the front, that is just a bonus. 

If anyone has any bright ideas or is interested in possibly striking a deal, I am happy to listen to proposals.

We can pretend we are baseball GM's hammering out a blockbuster trade :)

Thank you very much.

Derek

[quote name="DerekMichael" post=1076037]
We can pretend we are baseball GM's hammering out a blockbuster trade :)[/QUOTE]

you wanna put your boxing gloves on??  
p.m. me :)
Haha. If you are serious we can give it a try. Who knows, maybe we work out a three person trade!

I wanted to bump this thread one more time before these go to Mr. william Goodwin.

Thank You.

Derek
